entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
